title:
I\'m an avid recycler and can\'t stand to throw away plastic items much less anything else that display the recyclable symbol.  Why do area recycle sites only accept bottles but not other forms of recyclable plastics?  Imagine how much more we could recycle if more forms of plastic were accepted.



Also, as there are bins for aluminum recyclables, what about steel cans?
